title: How to Make Lemon Ice Box Pie

steps.headline: Add sweetened condensed milk and lemon juice to a good size mixing bowl.
Pour into graham cracker pie crust.
Spread Cool Whip decoratively over top of the pie.
Chill for at least 1 hour before serving.

text: Add sweetened condensed milk and lemon juice to a good size mixing bowl.  Mix until completely combined.  Pour into graham cracker pie crust.  Spread Cool Whip decoratively over top of the pie.  Chill for at least 1 hour before serving.
